product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
This was the first blush I ever purchased. The price is ridiculous (hence the 4 stars), however it is a good product. It is slightly more peach toned but it looks great on everyone. My friends borrow it all the time and love it. It can be used as an everyday natural look, or it can be layered for a show performance look. The packaging is adorable, but I will caution that it takes up a lot of room. The sparkling effect is great and makes the price a bit more worth it. I can use all 3 colours together or individually. Note that the lightest colour is not light enough to use as a highlight for my skin type as advertised. If you have the money it’s worth it, otherwise you could probably invest elsewhere.

review_title: Great if you want a natural, subtle blush!
review_content: I love this blush because it adds just the right amount of peachy glow to your face. I never really liked putting on blush because I thought it brought out my redness, but I do like this one because it's subtle and multidimentional. It works well for my office job when I want to look more natural, or if I go out at night I can layer a little more on and it still gives a nice glow.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
You need to really dig your brush into this, and I find it's actually hard to use these shades separately partially because it's so hard to get your brush to pick up the pigments, and partially because of the container and the way the different colours are places. Blended together though this creates a beautiful peachy shade. I love the bit of shimmer, however, if your cheeks are a problem area for you, keep in mind that shimmer can bring out imperfections in the skin.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: Cute blush with a subtle shimmer!
review_content:
It's my favourite blush to use on the daily, I love the three different shades you're given to work with. It's something you can play around with too, some days I like using a smaller brush on the lightest orange-pink shade as a highlighter on the top of my cheeks. The best thing about this blush of course is the subtle shimmer it comes with that other blushes just don't quite do. However, it is very faint and it doesn't last that long throughout the day even with a setting spray (and my oily skin type) and you can achieve the look that you want with alternative blushes that are much cheaper than this. But overall, it's classic and it's always been one of my favourite too faced products, you can't go wrong with it! <3

review_title: gorgeous color, but low pigment/staying power
review_content: Gorgeous color but very little pigment and even worse staying power. It’s absolutely gorgeous on, and the low pigment means I can get generous on the brush without worrying about looking like a clown. And I can continue to build and blend. But after all that work, it fades within an hour or two. If you don’t mind to reapply, it is a gorgeous color. Just wish it lasted longer on the skin.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: The sparkling Bellini blush has quickly become my favorite and go to blush! Personally, I prefer it over NARS orgasm blush. This blush is great on my skin tone, which is pale but as I start to get tanned as the weather gets warmer, this blush compliments my skin even better! It’s a great summer blush with the peachy, coraly sparkly undertones! Love this blush!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I'm not at all keen on blush, but I love this. It's not to intense with one layer, but it can build to be more intense if you like. I really nice finish!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I really enjoy using this as a blush and highlight, but it barely shows on my skin tone.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: If you're lazy like me and don't have time to apply blush, highlighter, and bronze, this is a great three in one that can be applied separately or all at once. Perfect for the on the go morning routine. Subtle and natural looking.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: They have the perfect peachy colors. I love the finish and the natural and healthy look. I would like have all them.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Doesn't work well on olive/yellow undertones well
review_content:
Unfortunately, as much as I love my Too Faced products this blush severely disappointed me. It barely showed up on my skin even when dipping into the color multiple times. I have olive skin with yellow undertones. I've never had issues with pinks, corals, etc. before but this barely showed up on me. I do not need something very bright, but having SOME color would have been nice with the price tag when I purchased on Too Faced' website. It truly is a beautiful color and the pictures do not do this product justice, just did not work on my skin tone./

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light']
review_content: I love this blush so much! The color is a very nice rosy shade, and it looks perfect after being applied once. You could use one of the three colors individually, and mixing all of three of them makes a wonderful blend. When I run out, I’m definitely repurchasing!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Too Faced has some pretty amazing products. I had been debating this purchase for a while. I finally got it in my recent Sephora haul, and I was not disappointed! The color is very pigmented, but it blends out like a dream. It's very buttery and smooth. When it blends out you are left with a beautiful soft pink flush, that doesn't look over done. I am in LOVE with this product!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush

review_content: This has a natural glow. The formula is buttery, buildable, and blendable.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
I've been looking for a blush palette and thought this was a nice compromise. However, once I swatched these colours, they had this slightly neon undertone to them which didn't look natural on my skin at all. Very 80s blush meets summer colours. So I returned it. Also, the packaging was clunky and takes up a lot of space for the amount of product it actually holds. If you have limited counter/drawer space for your makeup, this gets annoying.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
I picked this up because I needed a subtle blush to brighten up my face, and that is exactly what I got! The pigmentation isn't too intense, and I love the shimmer. The packaging is also adorable and sturdy, so I can throw it in my makeup bag without worrying about it. I love the versatility of the three shades and I can wear this in the summer and winter months. I definitely recommend this for pale skin tones that need a subtle hint of color!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Great product, just very sparkly. If you're going for lots of sparkle this is the blush for you. However, along with highlight, it can be a bit much. Prefer the matte blushes by tarte.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This is SO CUTE. I love the packaging, it's so wonderful when you can tell brands put effort into their presentation. The shimmer is fantastic, and really helps my highlight pop. Also a big fan of the peachy tones!

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I personally hate Too Faced makeup except for this blush. It's perfect natural flush that stays well on my skin. It's not crazy shimmery , I think it gives a perfect natural sheen to the skin.

product_name: Too Faced Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I love this blush! I’ve had this blush for quite a while and it’s still my summertime go-to. I have the shade Peach Beach and it definitely gives me that glowy, “been to the beach” vibe that I love during spring and summer, the shimmer in this product giving a lovely, healthy looking glow. I love that it has 3 different shades and love to swirl my brush around in all 3 for the full effect. I sometimes use my finger to pick up the lightest shade and use it as a peachy highlight on top of using the blush. I don’t really reach for it during fall and wintertime, but I still love this sparkly blush.
